com.cyc.query

Interface QueryRules


  • public interface QueryRules

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void allowAllRules()
      If any rules are specified on the inference parameters for this query, remove them and let Cyc decide what rules are relevant.
      Collection<Rule> getAllowedRules() 
      Collection<Rule> getForbiddenRules() 
      Collection<Rule> getPracticeRules() 
      void useOnlySpecifiedRules(boolean includePracticeRules)
      Relevant only for queries loaded from the KB (instances of CycLQuerySpecification), this loads all of the rules specified on the query and only allows Cyc to use those rules when running this query.

                           throws SessionCommunicationException

      • useOnlySpecifiedRules

        void useOnlySpecifiedRules(boolean includePracticeRules)
                    throws QueryConstructionException,
                           SessionCommunicationException
        Relevant only for queries loaded from the KB (instances of CycLQuerySpecification), this loads all of the rules specified on the query and only allows Cyc to use those rules when running this query.

        This is normally performed automatically by Cyc, but some older releases may not do so.

        Parameters:
        includePracticeRules - whether to include queryPracticeRules
        Throws:
        QueryConstructionException
        SessionCommunicationException

      • allowAllRules

        void allowAllRules()
        If any rules are specified on the inference parameters for this query, remove them and let Cyc decide what rules are relevant.
